Category: Tutorial

Posted on 11th March 2016 by Willb
UMA Animation Rig

 Categories: Tutorial
Leave a comment
Rig for making animations for UMA and importing as Humanoid. (It has all of the Adjust bones deleted.)

 

Import as scale 100, Rig Humanoid, and place in the animation controller.
